features.title: Complete features
features.subtitle: All the tools you need to manage your farm
features.parcelDesc: Manage your parcels with precision. Track crops, surfaces and geospatial data.
features.teamDesc: Permanent employees and day laborers. Attendance, wages and optimized scheduling.
features.satelliteDesc: NDVI, NDWI, NDMI indices to monitor crop health via satellite.
features.soilDesc: pH, humidity, NPK, organic matter. Laboratory and field analyses.
features.stockDesc: Inputs, fertilizers, seeds. Low stock alerts and expiration management.
features.profitabilityDesc: Calculate costs and revenues per parcel. Optimize your profitability.
features.analyticsDesc: Customizable dashboards. Export your data and reports.
features.infrastructureDesc: Equipment, buildings, irrigation systems. Maintenance and tracking.
features.weatherDesc: Integrated weather forecasts and utility services for your farm.
features.multiOrgDesc: Manage multiple farms. Permissions and roles per organization.
features.secureDesc: Secure authentication, Supabase RLS. Your data is protected.
features.realtimeDesc: Real-time updates with React Query. Reactive interface.
